data.actual_result: Profile teleports off screen, but slides on screen
data.expected_result: Profile picture slides on and off screen
data.short_description: When tapping on a user note, the profile picture doesn’t slide off screen when disappearing
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a user profile - Tap on the note section - Observe the animation of the profile picture disappearing - Exit the note section - Observe the animation of the profile picture returning
